quote: I have noticed that everyone who is for abortion has already been born.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Even if abortion were made easy or painless for everyone, it wouldn't change the bottom-line problem that abortion kills children.
author: Randy Alcorn

quote: The hairsplitting difference between formed and unformed makes no difference to us.  Whoever deliberately commits abortion is subject to the penalty for homicide.
author: Saint Basil

quote: Saying that there are too many children is like saying there are too many flowers.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I should have been an abortion. The only reason I wasn’t was that my father was a Christian.
author: Neko Case

quote: Let’s not pretend that abortion isn’t about the mass slaughter of innocents.
author: Michael Aston

quote: I certainly supported a woman’s right to choose, but to my mind the time to choose was before, not after the fact.
author: Ann B. Ross

quote: Too many people use abortion as a form of birth control. And that’s very wrong. I could never, ever have an abortion.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: Abortion should be listed as a weapon of mass destruction against the voiceless.
author: E. A. Bucchianeri

quote: Abortion and racism are both symptoms of a fundamental human error. The error is thinking that when someone stands in the way of our wants, we can justify getting that person out of our lives. Abortion and racism stem from the same poisonous root, selfishness.
author: Alveda King

quote: When we consider that women are treated as property it is degrading to women that we should treat our children as property to be disposed of as we see fit.
author: Cady Stanton
